Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client.GUIComponents

Class SantoriniWindow

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client.GUIComponents.SantoriniWindow
public class SantoriniWindow
extends java.util.Observable
Class that contains methods used to generate the graphic interface window of Santorini
Author:
Davide Mantegazza (10568661)
